names.english: asarum, dahurica, schizonepeta and saposhnikovia powder (topical)
names.commonEnglish: Asarum, Dahurica, Schizonepeta and Saposhnikovia Powder

actions: Releases the Exterior, expels Wind, vents rashes and relieves itching.
Releases the Exterior, expels External Wind-Dampness and alleviates pain.
With Jing Jie, for pruritic rashes.
Releases Exterior Wind and Cold, disperses Internal Cold and alleviates pain.
Expels Wind, eliminates Dampness, reduces swelling, eliminates toxins and expels pus.

symptoms: Pain and stiffness of the head and neck
Sores that are red, swollen and painful

notes: Grind equal portions of the ingredients together into a fine powder and store in a airtight jar. Prior to treating with the powder, decoct 3g Fr. Zanthoxyli Chuan Jiao in water and wash the affected area with the warm decoction for 5-10 minutes. Pat dry with a clean towel. Combine a portion of the powder with rice vinegar to forma a paste and apply to the lesions. Perform the entire procedure twice daily. Three days constitutes one course of treatment. Rest 1-2 days between courses. Most patients experience improvement within three courses.
